medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain for 24 hours, constant and unremitting; accompanied by nausea and emesis. Prior self-limited episodes of RUQ pain reported, but not as painful.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Arthritis; s/p tonsillectomy; s/p R TKR; s/p L foot tendon repair
medical_history.family_history: Both parents with heart problems and stroke; 1 brother and 3 sisters
